  <script type="text/javascript">
   function clearText(field){
if (field.defaultValue == field.value) field.value = '';}
function restoreText(field) {
if (field.value == '') field.value = field.defaultValue;}
  </script>

.cycloneslider-next:hover{opacity:1}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-prev.disabled,.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-next.disabled{display:none}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-pager{position:absolute;z-index:200;top:20px;right:20px}.rtl .cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-pager{right:auto;left:20px}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-pager span{display:inline-block;margin:0 3px;width:12px;height:12px;border-radius:6px;background:#333;vertical-align:top;font-size:0;line-height:0}.ie7 .cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-pager span{zoom:1;*display:inline}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-pager span.cycle-pager-active{background-color:#ccc}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-caption{position:absolute;left:0;bottom:0;width:100%;z-index:99;background:url(http://www.paveya.com/wp-content/plugins/cyclone-slider-2/templates/default/images/bg-caption.png);color:#fff;text-align:left}.rtl .cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-caption{text-align:right}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-caption-title{padding:10px 20px 5px 20px;font-size:22px;line-height:1;margin-bottom:0}.cycloneslider-template-default .cycloneslider-caption-description{padding:0 20px 15px 20px;line-height:1.5;font-size:12px}
  </style>
  <style media="all" type="text/css">

  <style media="all" type="text/css">

&gt; li{position:relative}.fa-li{position:absolute;left:-2.14285714em;width:2.14285714em;top:0.14285714em;text-align:center}.fa-li.fa-lg{left:-1.85714286em}.fa-border{padding:.2em .25em .15em;border:solid 0.08em #eeeeee;border-radius:.1em}.pull-right{float:right}.pull-left{float:left}.fa.pull-left{margin-right:.3em}.fa.pull-right{margin-left:.3em}.fa-spin{-webkit-animation:spin 2s infinite linear;-moz-animation:spin 2s infinite linear;-o-animation:spin 2s infinite linear;animation:spin 2s infinite linear}@-moz-keyframes   <script type="text/javascript">
   var wpversion = "4.1.5";
                    var agca_version = "1.4.6";
					var agca_debug = false;
                    var jQueryScriptOutputted = false;
                    var agca_context = "page";
                    function initJQuery() {
                        //if the jQuery object isn't available
                        if (typeof(jQuery) == 'undefined') {
                            if (! jQueryScriptOutputted) {
                                //only output the script once..
                                jQueryScriptOutputted = true;
                                //output the script (load it from google api)
                                document.write("&lt;scr" + "ipt type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js\"&gt;&lt;/scr" + "ipt&gt;");
                            }
                            setTimeout("initJQuery()", 50);
                        } else {
                            jQuery(function() {  
                                try
                                { 
                                                                                    jQuery('#wpadminbar').show();
                                                                        
                                            
                                   	
                         jQuery("#wpadminbar #wp-admin-bar-root-default &gt; #wp-admin-bar-wp-logo .ab-sub-wrapper").hide();
                         jQuery("#wpadminbar #wp-admin-bar-root-default &gt; #wp-admin-bar-site-name .ab-sub-wrapper").hide();                         
                         jQuery("#wpadminbar #wp-admin-bar-root-default &gt; #wp-admin-bar-wp-logo .ab-item").attr('title','');                                        

                        					

                	             
                
																																				
				                
                
                
                                	
                		                                                                     
                                         jQuery("li#wp-admin-bar-wp-logo a.ab-item span.ab-icon").html("&lt;img style=\"height:28px;margin-top:-4px\" src=\"https://www.paveya.com/wp-content/themes/paveya/images/paveya-admin.png\" /&gt;");
                                         jQuery("li#wp-admin-bar-wp-logo a.ab-item span.ab-icon").css('background-image','none');
                                         jQuery("li#wp-admin-bar-wp-logo a.ab-item span.ab-icon").css('width','auto');										 									 
                                         jQuery("li#wp-admin-bar-wp-logo a.ab-item").attr('href',"http://www.paveya.com");                                       
                                         jQuery("#wpadminbar #wp-admin-bar-root-default &gt; #wp-admin-bar-wp-logo .ab-item:before").attr('title','');    
										 jQuery('body #wpadminbar #wp-admin-bar-wp-logo &gt; .ab-item .ab-icon').attr('class','ab-icon2');	
                				                                                     
								 var href = "https://www.paveya.com/";                                                        
								 href = href.replace("%BLOG%", "http://www.paveya.com");
								 if(href == "%SWITCH%"){                                         
									href = "http://www.paveya.com";
									href+="/wp-admin";								 }
								 jQuery("li#wp-admin-bar-wp-logo a.ab-item").attr('href',href);                                        
                                
                                                	                           
                	
                                					                                        						
                                    
                                                }catch(ex){}
                            });                             
                        }
                    }
                    initJQuery();
  </script>

a.iso-active{background-color:#F175A8!important;}.stream li.dcsns-vimeo .section-intro,.filter .f-vimeo a:hover, .wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter .f-vimeo a.iso-active{background-color:#4EBAFF!important;}.stream li.dcsns-stumbleupon .section-intro,.filter .f-stumbleupon a:hover, .wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter .f-stumbleupon a.iso-active{background-color:#EB4924!important;}.stream li.dcsns-deviantart .section-intro,.filter .f-deviantart a:hover, .wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter .f-deviantart a.iso-active{background-color:#607365!important;}.stream li.dcsns-tumblr .section-intro,.filter .f-tumblr a:hover, .wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter .f-tumblr a.iso-active{background-color:#385774!important;}.stream li.dcsns-instagram .section-intro,.filter .f-instagram a:hover, .wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter .f-instagram a.iso-active{background-color:#413A33!important;}.wall-outer .dcsns-toolbar .filter li a {background:#777;}
  </style>
  <script>
   (function(d, s, id) {
  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_GB/all.js#xfbml=1";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function(){
    
    setTimeout(function(){

       $('.offer_div').animate({
    right: '+=472'
  }, 500);
  
    },30000);
    $('#close').click(function(){

    $('.offer_div').animate({
        right: '-=472'
      }, 500); 
    });
});
  </script>
  <script>
   (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-19358420-32', 'paveya.com');
  ga('send', 'pageview');
  </script>
 </head>

      <p>
       When it comes to pairing travelers from all over the world wit

       <div id="blog_banner_inner_left">
        <li class="widget-container widget_black_studio_tinymce" id="black-studio-tinymce-30">
         <div class="textwidget">
          <h2>
           Inbound Marketing Blog

           Learn the latest inbound marketing tips!
          </strong>
         </div>

     <div id="content">
      <div id="content_inner">
       <div style="position:absolute !important; margin-left:785px !important; width:174px; height:65px; padding-top:2px;">
        <li class="widget-container widget_black_studio_tinymce" id="black-studio-tinymce-23">
         <div class="textwidget">
          <div class="hubspot-partner">
           <a href="/services/hubspot-inbound-marketing/">
            <img alt="HubSpot Certified Agency" src="/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/hubspot-logo.jpg"/>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="widget-container widget_rssiconwidget" id="rssiconwidget-2">
         <a href="http://www.paveya.com/feed/" style="color: #ff0000; padding: 5px 0px 5px 15px; background: url('http://www.paveya.com/wp-content/plugins/rss-icon-widget/icons/feed-icon-10x10.png') no-repeat 0 50%;">
          Subscribe via RSS
         </a>
        </li>
       </div>
       <div id="content_inner_in">
        <div class="content_inner_in_post">
         <div class="">
          <li class="widget-container widget_rssiconwidget" id="rssiconwidget-2">
           <a href="http://www.paveya.com/feed/" style="color: #ff0000; padding: 5px 0px 5px 15px; background: url('http://www.paveya.com/wp-content/plugins/rss-icon-widget/icons/feed-icon-10x10.png') no-repeat 0 50%;">
            Subscribe via RSS
           </a>
          </li>
          <h1 class="entry-title">
           How to Use Buyer Personas for Vacation Rental Companies
          </h1>
          <div class="breadcrumbs">
           <div class="clear">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div>
           <div style="float:left; width:80%;">
            <div class="entry-meta">
             <span class="meta-prep meta-prep-author">
              Posted on
             </span>
             <a href="https://www.paveya.com/use-buyer-personas-vacation-rental-companies/" rel="bookmark" title="8:32 pm">
              <span class="entry-date">
               June 6, 2014
              </span>
             </a>
             <span class="meta-sep">
              by
             </span>
             <span class="author vcard">
              <a class="url fn n" href="https://www.paveya.com/author/lblack/" title="View all posts by Lynn Black">
               Lynn Black
              </a>
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="post-8169 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-internet-blog category-vacation-rental category-vacation-rental-marketing" id="post-8169">
             <div class="entry-content">
              <p>
              </p>
              <div class="wiziappshare_show">
               https://www.paveya.com/use-buyer-personas-vacation-rental-companies/
              </div>
              <span class="entry-content">
               <p>
                <a href="http://www.paveya.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/family-on-vacation-3.jpg">
                 <img alt="use buyer persona for vacation rentals" class="size-full wp-image-8172 alignright" data-id="8172" height="200" src="//www.paveya.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/family-on-vacation-3.jpg" width="300"/>
                </a>
                Vacation rental companies continue to create a stronger online presence due to growth in online travel bookings. The internet has become the first source of information for vacationers when planning their travel. Travelers now have the internet as a source to find any information regarding a location and it provides them with an ever-growing amount of choices for their next vacation rental company.
               </p>
               <p>
                If a vacation company wants to succeed in this atmosphere, it must understand its buyer persona. According to HubSpot, a buyer persona is a semi-fictional representation of your customer based on market research. Understanding your buyer persona allows rental companies to use this idea and plan marketing strategies to reach their persona. Here are some ways you can use your buyer persona to reach real-life leads.
               </p>
               <p>
                <b>
                 Focus your content to their wants and pain-points:
                </b>
                Understanding your buyer persona will allow you to cater your content to what they want in a vacation and their pain-points. If your buyer persona is focused on being oceanfront or next to a ski lift its a good idea to create content that explains all the great activities they can participate in by being so close. For example, create an E-book called, Great Restaurants and Shopping near the [Insert Location] Oceanfront/Ski Lifts.
               </p>
               <p>
                Alleviating pain-points is also suggested. Pain-points are things that concern vacationers about renting in the area or with your company. Creating content that answers concerns and reassures vacationers that their wants will be met in a satisfactory manner will improve the chances of them booking with the company. For example, if your buyer persona is younger couples, creating a blog about great nightlife within cabbing distance may be helpful. If a family is concerned there are not activities for children in the area, create a blog called, 8 Free Activities for Children in [Insert Area].
               </p>
               <p>
                <b>
                 Focus Social Media to Persona Outlets:
                </b>
                It is likely that your persona is on certain social media outlets. Finding these outlets and focusing on engaging on them is important. Choose these wisely. If the decision maker of your buyer persona is female, Pinterest is a good choice. Pinterest includes an overwhelming female demographic. If your persona decision maker is a professional, LinkedIn is a good choice. Facebook and Twitter are often standards across all personas. Google+ is gaining traction as an alternate social media account and benefits SEO.
               </p>
               <p>
                <b>
                 Post Content During Peak Times for Your Persona:
                </b>
                If you vacation rental company garners travelers from different time zones, post your content on their time. Your business may be on Pacific Standard Time, but your customers can be hours behind or ahead of your location. Understanding the day-to-day life of your buyer persona can help you pick times as well. If your buyer persona is a professional posting during their lunch time and near 5:00pm can be a good idea. If your persona is a stay at home mom, early morning or late at night may be used to reach the persona.
               </p>
               <p>
                These are just a few ways you can reach your buyer persona. Focusing more and more of your marketing towards this persona can gain more website visits and qualified leads while eliminating those who are not.
               </p>
               <p>
                <span class="hs-cta-wrapper" id="hs-cta-wrapper-80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8">
                 <span class="hs-cta-node hs-cta-80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8" id="hs-cta-80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8">
                  <a href="http://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/231527/80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8">
                   <img alt="" class="hs-cta-img" id="hs-cta-img-80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8" src="//no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/231527/80985e70-8d90-4374-843d-6cd7a671f7c8.png" style="border-width: 0px;"/>
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
                <span class="hs-cta-wrapper" id="hs-cta-wrapper-72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0">
                 <span class="hs-cta-node hs-cta-72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0" id="hs-cta-72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0">
                  <a href="http://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/231527/72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0">
                   <img alt="" class="hs-cta-img" id="hs-cta-img-72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0" src="//no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/231527/72db8edc-19d4-4794-a934-4d4b6a38b4c0.png" style="border-width: 0px;"/>
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
                <span class="hs-cta-wrapper" id="hs-cta-wrapper-6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984">
                 <span class="hs-cta-node hs-cta-6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984" id="hs-cta-6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984">
                  <a href="http://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/231527/6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984">
                   <img alt="" class="hs-cta-img" id="hs-cta-img-6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984" src="//no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/231527/6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984.png" style="border-width: 0px;"/>
                  </a>
                  <br/>
                 </span>
                 <br/>
                 <script charset="utf-8" src="//js.hscta.net/cta/current.js" type="text/javascript">
                 </script>
                 <br/>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p>
                <script type="text/javascript">
                 // 
hbspt.cta.load(231527, '6afa2858-aedf-484a-a23b-9818e0b25984');&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;
// ]]&gt;
                </script>
               </p>
               <p>
               </p>
              </span>
              <div class="hatom-extra">
               <span class="entry-title">
                How to Use Buyer Personas for Vacation Rental Companies
               </span>
               was last modified:
               <span class="updated">
                June 11th, 2014
               </span>
               by
               <span class="author vcard">
                <span class="fn">
                 Lynn Black
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="clear">
              </div>
             </div>

              </a>

               Vacation Rental Marketing
              </a>

              </a>

     </script>
     <li class="size-box" id="dcssb-linkedin">
      <script data-counter="top" data-url="https://www.paveya.com/use-buyer-personas-vacation-rental-companies/" type="in/share">
       execOnReady(function(){});
      </script>
     </li>
    </ul>
    <div class="clear">

    <div class="dc-corner">
     <span>
     </span>
    </div>
   </div>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    execOnReady(function(){_ga.trackFacebook();});
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(window).load(function() {

									
					var config = {
						idWrapper : 'dcssb-float',
						width: '98',
						location: 'top',
						align: 'right',
						offsetLocation: 100,
						offsetAlign: 50,
						center: false,
						centerPx: 0,
						speedContent: 800,
						speedFloat: 1600,
												tabText: '&lt;img src="//www.paveya.com/wp-content/plugins/slick-social-share-buttons/css/images/tab_top_floating.png" alt="Share" /&gt;',
						autoClose: true,
						loadOpen: true,
						tabClose: true,
						classOpen: 'dcssb-open',
						classClose: 'dcssb-close',
						classToggle: 'dcssb-link'				
					};
					if(!jQuery().dcSocialFloater) {
						jQuery.getScript('http://www.paveya.com/wp-content/plugins/slick-social-share-buttons/js/jquery.social.float.1.3.js', function(){
							jQuery('#dc-dcssb').dcSocialFloater(config);
						}); 
					} else {
						jQuery('#dc-dcssb').dcSocialFloater(config);
					}
								});
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    execOnReady(function(){
	// Media Grid global dynamic vars
	mg_boxMargin = 5;
	mg_boxBorder = 1;
	mg_imgPadding = 3;
	mg_delayed_fx = true;
	mg_filters_behav = 'standard';
	mg_lightbox_mode = "mg_classic_lb";
	mg_lb_touchswipe = false;
	mg_mobile = 800;

	mg_galleria_fx = 'fadeslide';
	mg_galleria_fx_time = 400; 
	mg_galleria_interval = 3000;
	});
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    execOnReady(function(){
		jQuery(document).ready(function() {
			jQuery('body').delegate('.mg_grid_wrap *, #mg_full_overlay *, #mg_wp_video_wrap .wp-video *', "contextmenu", function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
            });
		});
		});
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    asyncScripts = [{"name":"jquery-core","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-includes\/js\/jquery\/jquery.js?ver=1.11.1"},{"name":"jquery-migrate","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-includes\/js\/jquery\/jquery-migrate.min.js?ver=1.2.1","deps":["jquery-core"]},{"name":"jquery","src":"","deps":["jquery-core","jquery-migrate"]},{"name":"mg-frontend-js","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/media-grid\/js\/frontend.js?ver=3.121"},{"name":"jquery-form","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/contact-form-7\/includes\/js\/jquery.form.min.js?ver=3.51.0-2014.06.20","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"contact-form-7","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/contact-form-7\/includes\/js\/scripts.js?ver=4.1","deps":["jquery","jquery-form"],"extra":"var _wpcf7 = {\"loaderUrl\":\"http:\\\/\\\/www.paveya.com\\\/wp-content\\\/plugins\\\/contact-form-7\\\/images\\\/ajax-loader.gif\",\"sending\":\"Sending ...\",\"cached\":\"1\"};"},{"name":"gasocial","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/slick-social-share-buttons\/js\/ga.social_tracking.js","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"jqueryfloater","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/slick-social-share-buttons\/js\/jquery.social.float.1.3.js","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"super-rss-reader-js","src":"https:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/super-rss-reader\/public\/srr-js.js"},{"name":"dcwss-wall","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/wordpress-social-stream\/js\/jquery.social.stream.wall.1.3.js"},{"name":"dcwss","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/wordpress-social-stream\/js\/jquery.social.stream.1.5.min.js"},{"name":"wiziappshare_js","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/mobile-sharing-toolbar\/wiziappshare.js","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"jquery-cycle2","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/libs\/cycle2\/jquery.cycle2.min.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"jquery-cycle2-carousel","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/libs\/cycle2\/jquery.cycle2.carousel.min.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery","jquery-cycle2"]},{"name":"jquery-cycle2-swipe","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/libs\/cycle2\/jquery.cycle2.swipe.min.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery","jquery-cycle2"]},{"name":"jquery-cycle2-tile","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/libs\/cycle2\/jquery.cycle2.tile.min.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery","jquery-cycle2"]},{"name":"jquery-cycle2-video","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/libs\/cycle2\/jquery.cycle2.video.min.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery","jquery-cycle2"]},{"name":"cyclone-template-script-dark","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/templates\/dark\/script.js?ver=2.9.7"},{"name":"cyclone-template-script-thumbnails","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/templates\/thumbnails\/script.js?ver=2.9.7"},{"name":"cyclone-client","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/cyclone-slider-2\/js\/client.js?ver=2.9.7","deps":["jquery"]},{"name":"footer_script_0","src":"http:\/\/assets.pinterest.com\/js\/pinit.js","deps":[],"extra":""},{"name":"footer_script_1","src":"http:\/\/platform.twitter.com\/widgets.js","deps":[],"extra":""},{"name":"footer_script_2","src":"http:\/\/platform.linkedin.com\/in.js","deps":[],"extra":""},{"name":"footer_script_3","src":"http:\/\/www.paveya.com\/wp-content\/plugins\/akismet\/_inc\/form.js?ver=3.0.4","deps":[],"extra":""}];
		function execDelayedScripts(){
			if (scriptsToLoad&lt;=0){
				for (var i = 0; i &lt; asyncFunctions.length; i++){
					asyncFunctions[i]();
				}
			}else{
				setTimeout(execDelayedScripts,100);
			}
		}

		function loadAsyncScript(script){
			if (typeof(script.deps) == 'object'){
				for (var i = 0; i &lt; script.deps.length; i++){
					if (!include(loadedScripts,script.deps[i])){

						setTimeout(function (){
							loadAsyncScript(script);
						},100);
						return;
					}
				}
			}
			if (script.extra!=''){
				var extra = document.createElement("script");
				extra.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');
				extra.innerHTML = script.extra;
				document.body.appendChild(extra);
			}


			if (script.src!=''){
				var element = document.createElement("script");
				element.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');
				element.src = decodeURIComponent(script.src.replace(/\+/g, ' '));

				onload(element,function(){
					scriptsToLoad--;
					loadedScripts.push(script.name);
				});

				document.body.appendChild(element);
			}else{
				scriptsToLoad--;
				loadedScripts.push(script.name);
			}
		}

		var include = Array.prototype.indexOf
			?
				function(arr, obj) { return arr.indexOf(obj) !== -1; }
			:
				function(arr, obj) {
					for(var i = -1, j = arr.length; ++i &lt; j;)
					if(arr[i] === obj) return true;
					return false;
				};

		scriptsToLoad =  asyncScripts.length;
		for (var i = 0; i &lt; asyncScripts.length; i++){
			loadAsyncScript(asyncScripts[i]);
		}

		function documentReady() {
			execDelayedScripts();
		}

		function onload(element,func){
			if (element.addEventListener){
				element.addEventListener("load", func, false);
			}else if (element.attachEvent){
				element.attachEvent("onload", func);
			}else{
				element.onload = func;
			}
		}

		onload(window,documentReady);
   </script>
  </div>
 </body>
</html>
